title: Hotspot on my 3a XL is not working.
content:
My Laptop detect the hotspot on my phone and connect to it but it say connectivity is Limited. So, I can not go to any websites. I transferred my line from T-Mobile to Google Fi.
Is it related to firewall setting?
Is it related to frequency setting such as 2.4 Mhz vs 5 Mhz (I tried both but did not work)?
Window diagnostic test say, DNS server is not responding.
I called google technical support but they could not fix it either. They are still investigating.
Are there anyone who made hotspot work on their Pixel 3a XL?
Please help if you had similar problems and solved it.
Thanks
Veli
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
